name: Drag Show
description:
Drag Show does have a Timer Event for Gymnasium Park after the Tutorial! Dev time to beat is 106 seconds! Good luck!

Drag Show is a Third-Person 3D Grappling Hook Based Puzzle Platform, where we redefined Drag.

The game was developed to be a grey box gym environment to test and show off core mechanics involving a grappling hook and an excessive amount of rag doll.

**Game was created using Unreal Engine 4.23

Development Team

Bradley Dawn - Producer, Designer, Developer, Engineer 

Dan Spence - Producer, Designer, Developer, Engineer (106 second record holder)

Dana Ware - Producer, Designer, Developer, Engineer 

Hayden Griffin - Producer, Designer, Developer, Engineer

Nick Day - Producer, Designer, Developer, Engineer
